high_descs: Hang a left at the door and walk to the wooden desk.
Pick up the pencil from under the cell phone on the right side of the desk.
Turn around, take a right at the wooden shelves and walk to the small wooden table on the right.
Turn on the small lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Move forward to the door, turn left, move to the desk.
Pick up the pencil on the desk.
Bring the pencil to the table, left of the desk, with the lamp on it.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of the lamp on the table.

high_descs: Walk to the door then turn left and walk to the desk and take a step to your right.
Pick up the pencil that's in front of you under the black phone.
Turn left and take a step to your left then walk to the desk with the light on it turning right to face it when you get there.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pencil by lamp light.
